    passwordEncoder() - Method in class com.enzow.PeopleManagement.web.SecurityConfig

    PeopleManagementApplication - Class in com.enzow.PeopleManagement
     
    PeopleManagementApplication() - Constructor for class com.enzow.PeopleManagement.PeopleManagementApplication
     
    Persona - Class in com.enzow.PeopleManagement.domain
    JPA entity that represent a Person in the system This class is mapped to the 'persona' table in the MySQL DB It includes autogenerated id, and the necessary data to create a Persona object to be saved in the DB It is serialized by the implementation of Serializable The Data Lombok annotation automatically generates the getters, setters, toString, equals and hashCode methods
    Persona() - Constructor for class com.enzow.PeopleManagement.domain.Persona
     
    PersonService - Class in com.enzow.PeopleManagement.service
    Implementation of the IPersonService to manage CRUD operations related to the entity Persona This class interacts with the data access layer through IPersonDao and handles transactions by using Transactional Spring annotations
    PersonService() - Constructor for class com.enzow.PeopleManagement.service.PersonService
